website_summaries.verdict: A black scuba diving vest designed for all weather and water sports.
pros: Provides consistent temperature protection to help you stay warm
Sleeveless cut with Lycra binding leaves your arms free for mobility
First-rate front zipper is simple to use and enables you to quickly put the vest on or take it off
Intended for men, women, and children
cons: May be too loose or too tight for some users

customer_reviews.title: Probably ok over a wetsuit or shorty. Sizing seemed large.
customer_reviews.text: If your going to wear this over a shorty or wetsuit it might have fit properly. However over a shirt or bare skin it is to big to do its job for me. I am 6ft 3in 42 in chest. XL should have fit based on the sizing chart. It was to long for me and the neck was uncomfortably high. The neck wasn't tight so It wouldn't seal against water movement. And the waist wasn't tight either. I was going to try a large but the price had increased. It seemed to be well built. Maybe if the price changes I might try the large.
customer_reviews.author: cautious one

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, I've used it about a dozen times. But the zipper, though a sturdy size is reversed for female, no big deal. I seem to remember on my travels that that's the way it is in some other countries. The vest fit is definitely for males. The material is nice and stretchy so it is comfortable and warm enough for Oct. weather here in Memphis and with the pool water temperature around 68. No initial shock getting into the pool that usually hits one's upper back!
customer_reviews.author: finetunes

customer_reviews.title: Great Wetsuits Vest! Quite useful.
customer_reviews.text: I swim everyday to lost weight around 11:00pm, the water is quite cold so I decided to buy a wetsuits. Then I choice this one. I am quite satisfied with it. It choice the size from the size chat and it fits me perfectly. Also it really keeps me warm in swimming pool without too much burden. I also want to surf with it soon. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Qiukulicaomushen

customer_reviews.title: I Was able to try it on and the chest area was snug and nice. However the "gut" area was slightly tight
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Just arrived today. I normally wear Large shirts so i ordered X-Large. I based my size o the chary as well. I Was able to try it on and the chest area was snug and nice. However the "gut" area was slightly tight. So is it the vest fault? Not at all! It just dawned on me that my self promise to lose weight before i go on my vacation failed!! My gut is bigger than my chest! other than that, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dobo

customer_reviews.title: Good product, somewhat larger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Good product. However, I expected the same tight fit as a rashguard, but the sizing on this product is more loose. I am a medium size for t-shirts, and large size for rashguards (and they fit tight). So, I ordered this on a large size, and it was very loose. I ordered then on a medium size, and it was a slightly tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T

customer_reviews.title: but this seems like a fine quality product to me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very experienced with wetsuits, but this seems like a fine quality product to me. It does have a left handed zipper, but that isn't a big deal. It still goes on easy. I'm 160 lbs with a size 40 chest and the size L fit me exactly as I had hoped... a bit on the snug size without being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: very nice vest - does its job well!
customer_reviews.text: My strong recommendation is to get this in a size too SMALL. I am a 40 regular (maybe even 41) and the large was a bit too large for me, as it would begin riding up as soon as I got in the water. Neoprene is supposed to be extremely tight fitting! The seller was awesome though and sent me out a replacement!! <3
customer_reviews.author: Deacon Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great value with an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a while for having this great wet jacket - Well made with an affordable price . Pink is not my favorite color but I don’t look bad at all in this one . My recommendation is to buy this in a size a little bit larger. I am 5’6” and was around 135 pounds. Since I have just lost some weight , size M fits me perfectly now . Chest area was a little bit tight at the beginning but gets more snug and comfortable later due to its flexibility .
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Nice length and thickness to this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors of this wetsuit jacket. I read a lot of the reviews regarding size, and purchased the 2 XL based on the size chart. I wore it today to play water volleyball, and felt that it kept me warm. The longer I had it on, I did feel that it started to get looser in the water and ride up some. I'm only 5' 2" tall so I like the longer length of this. Could I have purchased the XL? Not sure, but plan to keep this one. Hopefully, it won't continue to stretch out the longer I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: FL Boomer

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Cute jacket! After reading the other reviews I was concerned that it would be too small. I have a slender frame; I am 5’ 7.5’ and 110 pounds and ordered a medium. Thankfully, it fits. It is not very tight, and I’m sure a small would have fit me too, however I like the length of the medium. Because the jacket does not fit snuggly through the waist, it can ride up while swimming. Nevertheless, I’m happy with the purchase! The outdoor pool I swim in is kept quite cool, this jacket helps, but did not completely prevent me from feeling a little chilly.
customer_reviews.author: November

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but rides up
customer_reviews.text: I am tall with broad shoulders so I bought a large based on chest size. It is very tight in the shoulders, somewhat tight in the chest, and crazy tight on my arms, forearms being the worst. But the part around my stomach is like a tent that floats up in the water. Annoying. Unless your stomach is bigger than your chest this will likely be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Works well for price but stretches out...Buy Small
customer_reviews.text: These work great to keep core warm but they stretch out in water which allows the cold water to enter. I recommend you get two sizes smaller than your size. I ended up keeping my Daughter's and returning hers. (She's a size 10 and I'm a 14)
customer_reviews.author: renegade1234

customer_reviews.title: Protection not warmth
customer_reviews.text: I have a full 3mm suit but got this for the intermittent season with cold mornings that turn to warm days. I’m 6’3 195lb and got a medium, the arms stay tight but the waist portion let’s water through and moves around. So not necessarily warm however I was out last week and while paddling felt a sting in my hand to see a jellyfish with its tentacles wrapped around my wrist and hand. Thankfully it was only painful and not harmful to me but the areas in which the wetsuit top covered prevented the tentacles from stinging my wrist so defiantly worth the money in protection alone.
customer_reviews.author: Scott O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vest base on the size chart. Once in the water, it expanded and water will rush beneath the vest which render the vest useless. Once you have water inside, the whole vest float to the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: A NICE QUALITY & ATTRACTIVE WETSUIT.....WORTH THE MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: THE MEN'S EXTRA LARGE THAT I ORDERED, WAS TOO SMALL...I SENT IT BACK...I THEN ORDERED AN XX LARGE....NOW, IT FITS FINE....FOR MEN'S SIZING, I WOULD ORDER ONE SIZE UP...OTHERWISE, IT IS WELL PRICED, AND LOOKS AND FEELS GREAT... THE ZIPPER HANDLE, IN ON THE GAL'S LEFT SIDE TO CLOSE...NO BIG DEAL....I AM ON MY WAY TO THE OCEAN!!! THANK YOU AMAZON ONCE AGAIN..
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and not binding
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. I use it for water aerobics pool. It is on the cool side and this jacket keeps me warm. Large zipper makes it easy to remove and put on. Holds up in chlorine pool use 7 days a week time several months. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jump

customer_reviews.title: great for swimming during evening in a windy day
customer_reviews.text: great for swimming during evening in a windy day. i used to wear a wetsuit which is overkill. this vest is perfect. sleeveless frees up my arms for butterfly. tried it couple times, the material is soft and stretchy. no special rubber smell like my old wetsuit. i think it's similar to my friend's $4x vest.
customer_reviews.author: speeder

customer_reviews.title: Just wish they can offer long sleeve style then that would be great.
customer_reviews.text: The size and style is exactly what I want. I can wear a swimsuit inside then put this on. I bought size M and it fit for women. It is not too tight or too lose and you have to wear longsleev inside if you want to keep warm. Just wish they can offer long sleeve style then that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: xin.chen

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because I needed once size up. I wear a size 40 jacket and a large is what I needed. I got the medium because all of my shirts are now medium because manufacturers keep upping the size.
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Priced right.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware - I'm 6'4" and 205 lbs with a 40" chest and 39 "waist. I definitely had to order 2XX. But, I had to tailor out 2 inches from each side to make it fit. I'm sure that most 6'4" guys would fill this out, but not slimmer folks with my frame. I bought this item mainly for price. I had to alter it, but I'm still happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bolillo

customer_reviews.title: Order smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Light weight makes it ideal in Florida coast line snorkeling. However, order much smaller size. Based on their chart I initially ordered large. Much too large. I then ordered mid but still too large. I’m now comfortable, snug, with small. Ultimately, I kept the large and small. I intend to wear the large over the small in less warm water.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I scuba dive and always get cold. We wanted to snorkel but I didn’t want to wear my wetsuit. This jacket is the ticket. I bought a small, chest size 34D, 5’8”. It was a tight fit but perfect once you get in the water. Great product and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Whimpy

customer_reviews.title: Runs EXTREMELY Small
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric - BUT, it runs extremely small - you must go up "at least" by 2 sizes. I normally wear a Medium (8 - 10) & the Large was way too small. I thought about exchanging for an XXL but changed my mind. I returned it, so i really could not rate the "warmth".
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: it fits great and seems to be of good quality
customer_reviews.text: followed the sizing guide at is related to waist and chest, although I am not the height in the chart, it fits great and seems to be of good quality. Worth the price for sure...
customer_reviews.author: Joel Koch

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item for a co-worker at a summer camp. He didn't feel very comfortable with his shirt off and wanted something he could use in the pool. Found this item and ordered it for him. He really liked it and it has worked well for him.
customer_reviews.author: Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it’s a perfect shaper for the upper body, looks very sporty, sturdy material. Fact it is sleeveless is great as it frees your arms to swim. It holds perfectly well (doesn’t roll) in spite of jumping up and down in crushing ocean waves. Finally it protects you from the initial cold water shock. I am 5’ 11’’ 215 pounds, I got the XXL it fits perfect .
customer_reviews.author: monir shalaby

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is on left (women's side)
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this because the sleeves were too short ( waiting for another 1 size up). If the zipper being on the ladies' side bothers you, don't get this. Otherwise it seemed fine but obviously I haven't used it
customer_reviews.author: mcg

customer_reviews.title: IT FITS VERY TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Buy on the large size --- I am under 100 lbs. and wear a medium. It lasts well (my first one lasted 1 year using it in an indoor pool for class approximately 3 times a week.)
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M. Ober

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in cold water.
customer_reviews.text: I tried last week when the temperature dropped below 50, and body feels like around 30 in the lake. it makes much more easier and feel OKAY to stay or swimming in the cold water at least 1 hour. The price is ok and very comfy to wearing it for the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY

customer_reviews.title: As listed
customer_reviews.text: As listed and a great value, no pockets but a basic wetsuit top to keep you warm, I liked it so much I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Fox

customer_reviews.title: A good bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. Medium for my 165 lbs frame nicely. Great for early morning swim when it's cool out.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks and feels great. After reading some reviews that stated it ran on the small side, I wasn’t sure if I should order a small (my size) or a size up. I ordered a small. At first I thought it might be running a bit small because it was very fitted and a little tight, but once in the water it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable vest and ready for my Summer !
customer_reviews.text: I like my new vest and i am preparing for this coming summer. Even the summer is not yet, however I tried the wetsuits in my backyard ground pool and feel very comfortable. The only thing i can suggest to this vest is if it could design more pockets.
customer_reviews.author: LIANG C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product I think but rec'd wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, suggest getting 1 size larger as my dive buddy suggested; However, I received a suit vest instead, so returned it; Now I'll have to try again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Size correctly and with the front zipper put on/off is a breeze. 2mm is a little thinner but works for 50 degree water.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ_shpr_KT

customer_reviews.title: Sized a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Kept me warm in frigid Atlantic---sized a bit small. Would get large next time but I can live with it
customer_reviews.author: Helen Orr

customer_reviews.title: Fits snugly, but not overly tight. My husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits snugly, but not overly tight. My husband will be able to wear a rash guard shirt underneath. He's only using it for swimming and snorkeling, since he needs a it of buoyancy to help him float. His chest measures 41-42; in pants he wears a 36 waist. Hasn't been used in water yet.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M

customer_reviews.title: and so far so good. He will try it out in the ocean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He wears it only in the pool , and so far so good. He will try it out in the ocean , and if it works out, I will write another review. The quality of the fabric is good and very comfortably fitting. The sizes run a little tight, so you might need to go a size up than your usual. Solid Materials. Good zipper. Keeps him warm in . Also You can wear a surf rash guard shirt under the vest.
customer_reviews.author: EttaG

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my snorkeling gear !
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase ! Kept me warm snorkeling up to 4 hours a day on recent trip. Water temp about 79 degrees, Also great when riding a fast boat when wet. It kept me pretty warm while others with just swimsuits were suffering.
customer_reviews.author: Freytag

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for wearing on the jet ski. Does what it should.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hood

customer_reviews.title: Great for swims
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great fit, comfortable, warmth with a little buoyancy. Top quality
customer_reviews.author: Myhj68

customer_reviews.title: Perfect water vest
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, comfortable, warm, good zipper that will not corrode. Adds a little buoyancy and warm. Used it in 70 degree Florida ocean and was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Minion

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just got my order in about 17 hours which was amazing. The vest was good quality and a perfect fit. The stitching and zipper was perfect. No logos or labels, but who needs them. Very happy with my new vest.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but incorrect size chart
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the material is very nice though the size chart is wrong. I'm 5'2 109lbs and I followed the chart and got (L). It's bigger than I expected! My mom saw it and liked it. She's 5'2.5 128lbs. I bought myself another one with (S) since I want a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: MatelB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product as it keeps arms free for daily mile ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product as it keeps arms free for daily mile swim. Small observation-zipper is soon in for woman's style-right to left but small point. It's well made and definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chaplain

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely when dry but loose when in the water and ...
customer_reviews.text: Followed the sizing chart and ordered a large. Fits nicely when dry but loose when in the water and it also rides up. in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase...especially for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Warm for water therapy. Not hard to take off wet. I bought two sizes and returned the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Size up unless you like a super tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fit. It was tight but not too tight. For reference, I am 5'6, 36 cup and usually wear size small womens top. I ordered the size M and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it would not keep you warm. don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: very cheap, does not fit well. wont keep you warm at all. Dont buy it
customer_reviews.author: benita estevez

customer_reviews.title: Size up only one
customer_reviews.text: 165 reviews said 3xl and it’s way too big. Size up but not too much. Works great though.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Descheneaux

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Warm in cool water but runs a little small. Good value overall.
customer_reviews.author: KandaceMazon

customer_reviews.title: Fits. Warm enough for swimming and snorkeling.
customer_reviews.text: Fit me. I’m a U.S. large and ordered this for my 44” chest size. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: plum_1000

customer_reviews.title: Good vest
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but order the next size larger than your size. Very snug.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Flint

customer_reviews.title: Good wet suit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a inexpensive wet suit vest for kayaking. Good stitching and heavyweight zippers. The 3mm is the right thickness for what I needed. Overall very nice vest.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Fields

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesnt fit
customer_reviews.text: Its very warm and works great out in the open sea but it isnt tight like i would like it to be. I have a 44 chest and a 32 waist. Not much fits me anyways
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size 2-3 sizes off
customer_reviews.text: The size is not close to original size. I wear a large and I bought 2xx and I can’t put it over my arms. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl hale

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, but I haven't tested in the water yet. I will update when I do
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good to protect against the cold when playing water volleyball in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen H.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. Fits as expected, no issues. Zipper is large and easy to use, zipper guard means not pinching.
customer_reviews.author: Rich B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very warm, just what my husband needed for cool fall evening fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Howard

customer_reviews.title: It Fits!
customer_reviews.text: I found sizing chart to be accurate. My item arrived quickly and everything was as advertised. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fantastic price. Seems to be well made, Purchased for my husband. Will know more when he uses it in the waters of the Bahamas next week. A little large in the waist area, but guess they need to make it to fit people a little bigger in the mid section, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Swimming in the pool in late evening feels very cold ...
customer_reviews.text: Swimming in the pool in late evening feels very cold. This top suite is beyond my expectation! Very warm and fits me well!
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick, fit as expected, Haven't used it in the water yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Vercouteren

customer_reviews.title: true fit, good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Buying wetsuit gear is always a gamble without trying it on, but this was true to fit, nice flat seams, good price. nothing not to like.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for when the water a little cooler
customer_reviews.text: I used it for snorkeling around La Paz, Baja Sur, Mexico in March when the water was cool, and it really kept the chill off. The zipper worked well too.
customer_reviews.author: masomenos

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters
customer_reviews.text: The size of this product is way off. I wear a size 12 ladies. I had to get a size 3X. But it worked great after I figured that out.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The size chart is very accurate. The jacket feels comfortable. Looking forward to wearing it on future snorkeling trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It swims on me a bit, No Punn inteded! Can I exchange it for a smaller one?
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit me. Too loose in the gut, too tight in the chest
customer_reviews.author: meatonski

customer_reviews.title: Wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Love this wet suit. Fits perfect. Easy to put on and keeps me warm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kinda heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it seems a bit heavy to swim in so not sure how it will work. It's smaller than I thought but maybe that will just prompt me to lose some weight !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits and works well
customer_reviews.text: i only used it for couple times, it fits well and is very easy to put on and take off with the zipper. Well made product and a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Genn

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the heat in, I can move around, flexes nicely with my body movements. Works great for what I got it for.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie Butler

customer_reviews.title: Sizes for wet suit run small
customer_reviews.text: The sizes run small order about two size than you need. The quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product. It is made of good material & ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It is made of good material & feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: looks good and fit well on my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: This fit well however the zipper broke in the first weekend.
customer_reviews.author: craig piotrowski

customer_reviews.title: Quality Top
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and buying a large was right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good as an extra layer...zipper on the opposite side than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down. Good product
customer_reviews.text: Agree that runs a little big, so size down. Other than that, sxactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the flotation is great i can lay perfectly still and the vest keeps me afloat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I buy it for my husband and he love it so much
customer_reviews.text: you can't image how the strong sunshine in California! I buy it for my husband and he love it so much.The size is fit for he and hope to protect his skin.Even I spend long time to receive ,itstill worth to recommend
customer_reviews.author: MollyGlodburg

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: it keeps me nice and warm in the water. Feels very comfortable with my size. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: GON Town

product_meta.title: Realon Wetsuits Top Jacket Vest Mens Women 2mm Neoprene Long Sleeve/3mm Sleeveless Shirt Front Zip Sports XSPAN for Scuba Diving Surf Swimming Snorkel Suit
product_meta.description:
★REALON quality neoprene and nylon outside increase warmth,allowing you to dive,surfing,swimming, and snorkel,longer,and warmer.Our wetsuit jackets are made from neoprene- synthetic rubber. The wetsuit jacket might seem too tight when the customers are trying on at home or anywhere out of the water but will turn out to be just right when the wetsuit jacket is wet. Because when the wetsuit jacket is dry, it tend to stick in some places. When it fills with water the sticky spots slip a little.

★ REALON Wetsuit Jacket Features: 
>>1. 2mm/3mm neoprene mens/women wetsuit top, it reduces the drag in water and keeps the divers warm.. 
>>2. It provides for the warm comfort and flexibility you need on the waves, 
>>3. Excellent stretch and recovery,Lightweight wetsuit top dries quickly to keep you feeling fantastic. 
>>4. Fashion design gains gorgeous while surfing or canoeing.

★For the Size: 
>> ① The wetsuit suitable for men or women,but please refer to our size table and chose the best size after measuring your Chest/Waist and other data.( NOT YOUR NORMAL SIZE ). 
>> ② Wetsuit should be a tight fitting that keep warm in cold water. 
>> ③ If you don't want feel tight, order 1~2 size up base on size selection.

★About Smell: 
>> The smell of Neoprene is normal and have no danger, it would be easy gone after a few time washes. Before you wear it, 
>> please soak this neoprene jacket in cold water and hand wash, air dry it out to release smell.

★Washing instructions: 
>> Hand wash in cold water with a soft detergent. Squeeze out and drain.

★Skin sensibility: 
>> If your skin is allergic to rubber, please take it off immediately, or make sure you wear it over t-shirt and not direct on the skin.

★Package: 
>> 1 *wetsuit jacket.
feature_bullets: Soft / keep warmer / waterproof / light weight
Neri titanium coating unique technology , keep body warmer lining
★ 3mm SNORKELING VEST- Water sleeveless wetsuit vest designed for all weather and water sports: surfing, scuba, swim, diving, wakeboarding, paddling, canoeing fluid paddle etc.

★ SEVERAL USES- Sports life vest Wear as a standalone with boardshorts or as achill blocker layer , breathable and quick dry. Good heat preservation effect helps to keep you warm in cold water, create a comfortable watersports environment for you.
★ MATERIAL- Top Neoprene and Nylon material ,comfortable lightweight fit mens summer vest,professional triathlon original YKK 10# front zipper is easy on and off for you.

★ MOVEMENT DESIGN- Wetsuit vest sleeveless cut with lycra binding leaves arms free for mobility. Provide you an unbelievably stretchy, comfortable and hugging fit while you are swimming, snorkeling, and playing other watersports.

★ NOTE & WARRANTY - 30 days unconditional refund, 24 hours service.A full refund is guaranteed if you aren’t satisfy with the product for any reason. Hang dry in the shade, dry off for tucked preservation.
